title: sheyyum vaghai
sahitya:
sheyyum vaghai ariyEn manam kaniya


anupallavi

   aiyandiripara meipporuL nIyenru arindum urugik-kaNNIr shorindum unaittudi


caraNam    kallAgil kamalakkazhalennai manniDumO kani tandAl unran karuNai shurandiDumO
 kapiyAgil tuNai kETTa kaNamE kiDaittiDumO karattil kOdaNDattuDan kAttiDa ingu vara
